predicate.note: Frames file for 'fundraise' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: raise funds

example.name: polysythesis?
example.text: That impressed Robert B. Pamplin, Georgia-Pacific's chief executive at the time, whom [Mr. Hahn]-1 had met while *trace*-1 fundraising for the institute.

roleset.note: Ordinarily this would be "so-and-so raised funds for X" with "funds" in the arg1 position, but "funds" has been glommed onto the verbs itself and so cannot exist as an independent arg. For consistency, though, the beneficiary is left in arg2.
